text: Arau yoraa kali yisakale tara darae horaara kamana karaichila, sihamte ka’balai dharaile, ‘coraa, allahe te'omra bandasakalara majata yara babe iccha tara jiraika brd'dhi karai diye arau yara babe iccha tara babe hraasa karai diye. Yadi allahe amara prati sadaya naha’lehemtena tente amako te'om bhugarbhata puti pelalehemtena. Coraa, kaphirasakala ketiya'o saphalakama ha’ba noraarae’
